space_scenes.function: 主就餐区域，适合相机推进运动
space_scenes.prompt: Modern minimalist restaurant open dining area, clean white walls, light oak wood floors, simple black pendant lights hanging from ceiling, rectangular wooden dining tables neatly arranged in rows, black metal chairs, floor-to-ceiling glass windows on left side with natural light, green plants in white planters, minimalist geometric shelving on right wall, spacious aisles between tables, strong sense of depth and perspective, 45-degree angle perspective view, photographic quality, 8K, professional interior design rendering, bright and airy atmosphere, architectural photography style
space_scenes.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, unrealistic, amateur, oversaturated, cluttered, messy, cartoon, dark, dim lighting, people, text, watermark
